About Me

BIO

I am very interested in IT in general, specifically web-development. A conscientious, fast learner offering the ability to assess an organization's needs and create a complementary, robust web presence. Currently spending a lot of time learning new technologies, developing and building websites and apps, and simply improving my skills. I am keen to gain more experience in real-life tasks. For this reason, I am looking for a company willing to offer me a place among their developers. In return, I would offer my full commitment. Also, willing to quickly learn the technologies you are using.
